Name: Carmike Cinemas, Inc
Description: DELISTED - Carmike Cinemas, Inc. is a motion picture exhibitor. As of December 31, 2011, the Company owned, operated or had an interest in 237 theatres with 2,254 screens located in 35 states. As of December 31, 2011, the Company had 220 theatres (93% of its theatres) with 2,128 screens (94% of its screens) on a digital-based platform. As of December 31, 2011 the Company had 210 theatres (89% of its theatres) with 744 screens (33% of its screens) equipped for three dimensional (3-D). In August 2013, Carmike Cinemas Inc announced the closing of purchase of three digital entertainment complexes totaling 52 screens in Louisville, KY (Stonybrook 20), Voorhees, NJ (Ritz Center 16) and Hickory Creek, TX (Hickory Creek 16) from Cinemark USA, Inc., a wholly owned subsidiary of Cinemark Holdings, Inc. In November 2013, the Company purchased nine entertainment complexes with an aggregate of 147 screens in Florida, California, and Illinois from Muvico Entertainment, L.L.C.
